title: Blended Learning-Based Competency Development Program in Social Studies

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Project-based assessment in smartphone-centric learning environments

learning_goals: Learners will utilize digital content (videos/infographics) for social phenomenon analysis via smartphone at least three times weekly
Learners will design and present one collaborative social problem-solving project through face-to-face team activities
Learners will establish communication competencies by exchanging peer feedback at least twice weekly in online discussion forums

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
